935750.name: Antiquitas
935750.description:
Step into the toga of a Roman governor and build your own ancient empire from the ground up!

Antiquitas is a historical city-building simulation from the creator of My Colony, set in the golden age of Rome. Grow your civilization from a humble village into a mighty empire, managing resources, citizens, and trade across expansive ancient landscapes.

- Build anytime, anywhere - no connection required!

- Resource production and trade

- Full colony simulation – housing, jobs, education, entertainment

- Deep tech tree spanning Roman innovation

- Trade and interact with other players online (optional)!

Whether you’re a seasoned city-builder or new to the genre, Antiquitas offers a rewarding and relaxing empire management experience with no time limits or paywalls.

Begin your rise to glory today!
935750.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
